titles.title: Lord Of The Valleys, Lord Of The Night

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord of the valleys, Lord of the night:
A people in darkness have seen a great light!
So we sing in the darkness, we sing in the night.
Our song drives away all the birds of the night.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord of the valleys, Lord of the night:
A people in hiding offer hearts prepared to fight.
So we sing in the darkness, we sing as we fight.
Our song pierces through all the voices of the night.
